name: Bullets & Bombs Prototype
description:
Bullets & Bombs is a multi-directional reaction game for mobile devices. It takes inspiration from the classic retro game Asteroids and the endless runner Jetpack Joyride.
This is the prototype to see how people feel about the game and how they would think it would do on mobile. Please fill out the feedback form so that I can keep working on improvement. Also feel free to join my Discord.

Feedback Form: Feedback

Discord: https://discord.gg/EjDMuNtn8B
